item.description:
Event Description: Dr Paul will be speaking at the Liberty Forum in Nashua. Come give him a heroes reception after his speech by sign-waving outside the hotel. And it's not to late to get tickets if you want to be inside when he speaks.

Learn more here:
http://ronpaul.meetup...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll make myself visible by wearing a Ron Paul Sweatshirt.
item.name: Greet Ron Paul after Liberty Forum
